Comment: If you buy a new computer, as opposed to building one, it's gonna come with bloatware.  This government had bloat and a thousand browser tabs open. There are many federal library agencies, this is just one of them, and the only justification for its existence is "summer reading programs" well, okay I guess America will become illiterate because 75 bloatstaff won't receive their $266M in grants this year.
Author: Right_Archivist
